column5: I dont know what I will do when it,s long gone,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,, It,s fading fast. The lush green has turned to brown.
beauty fat fish. lots of energy in that one I bet.
nice one!!!! although that maple leaf looks oddly familiar!
B just take stake with you and plant it  where that blade of grass is, with a sign NO FISH HERE!
Nice fish Brian! Creeks here were chocolate milk today.  Tomorrow will be prime but I'm not joining the rest of the crowds there on a weekend!
Looks like I need to work on my back ground shots.   Seems a couple of members found me this morning.  Nice to see you Mike (MJL) and Anthony (FROZEN FIRE). Tough fish today for sure.
Sounds like you're getting out a fair bit Bri, very cool, beauty football too!
Sounds like you're getting out a fair bit Bri, very cool, beauty football too!  Thanks Chris    I am having fun.    Rod in hand,fish on the end.

Looks like I need to work on my back ground shots.   Seems a couple of members found me this morning.  Nice to see you Mike (MJL) and Anthony (FROZEN FIRE). Tough fish today for sure.  Brian I have a crystsal ball and today I asked it, "where can I go to grease Brian out of his drift"...And it worked  The fishing was only tough if you didn't have the secret bait or the secret lure  Great to share a drift with you again
Now that's a football!  Nice fish!

Thanks fellas    Brian I have a crystsal ball and today I asked it, "where can I go to grease Brian out of his drift"...And it worked  The fishing was only tough if you didn't have the secret bait or the secret lure  Great to share a drift with you again  LOL Mike  You need to land them, to count,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,, You city guys  Always a nice time talking and drifting with ya.  I brought out the fly rod today along with the pin. Nothing like trying to throw a fly and it comes right back and smacks ya in the face. Wind was brutal today.

Thanks fellas    LOL Mike  You need to land them, to count,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,, You city guys  Always a nice time talking and drifting with ya.  I brought out the fly rod today along with the pin. Nothing like trying to throw a fly and it comes right back and smacks ya in the face. Wind was brutal today.  We city boys had no problems landing them after a good Mcdonald's feast for lunch  For the stretch we fished today, we were mostly sheltered and drifting/casting wasn't too bad...You gotta learn how to spey cast!
I'll be hitting the creeks tomorrow morning.  Hopefully I get one or two...
Us city boys can land some fish after a bit of food in the tummy.  Nice seeing you Brian.
